about_the_game:
A sex-enhanced RPG that makes you stronger every time you have sex!
Four girls with rich personalities have individual sex scenes!
Each of the four girls has her own voice acting voice data!
Dot picture mode is included to satisfy dot picture lovers!

A naughty new alchemist and his friends,
This is a erotic RPG made by RPG Maker, in which a naughty new alchemist and his friends have sex while defeating the Demon King.
The H-scenes are quickly released as the story progresses,
You will be satisfied with both those who want to enjoy RPG and those who want to enjoy H-scene!



◆Synopsis.
Iris is a rookie alchemist who runs a small alchemy workshop with no customers.
He was supposed to ask for help from a statue of a goddess, but for some reason, he ends up defeating the Demon King!
In order to defeat the Demon King, he has no choice but to travel all over the continent collecting semen.
But his traveling companions include a sassy female heroine, a natural dragon knight, and even the client's goddess!
Iris and her quirky companions are on an adventurous journey that will have you laughing and having sex. ......



◆Game Features
H-able characters: 4 main characters *Accommodates a wide variety of sexual proclivities, including honest big tits, sassy girls, ignorant brains, and almighty sluts!
Number of H scenes: Total 12 scenes + 1 extra CG *Various situations such as rape, rape, brothel, slum, hypnosis, orgy, etc.! No repeat use of any of the scenes!
Number of HCGs: 39 in total *13 basic CGs in 3 variations: normal mode, dot-picture mode (weak), and dot-picture mode (strong)
H-scene voices: 4 characters each with different voice data from popular voice actors!
H-scene sound effects: Complete with ejaculation sounds and popping sounds that change tempo according to the development of the scene!
H-scene sectional view: Available *Option to turn on/off
H-scene ejaculation countdown: Available *Optional ON/OFF
H-scene all open function: Available *No penalty for using this function
Recollection mode: Available *Conversation before H-scene can be replayed
Cheat function: Yes *With fixed winning skills and level-up function, even those with little time can enjoy the game (of course, there is no penalty).
Ending: 1 type *No need to worry about forcing the player to play in a bind!
Story: A funny, light-hearted story that will make you feel attached to each character.
Battle difficulty: Just right *A former employee of a home video game company made serious adjustments.

◆Line of live action play guide
If you are an individual, you are welcome to play in live-action on video distribution sites or in eroge RTA videos/distributions. There is no problem with monetization or throwing money.

Also, it is not allowed to use data obtained through illegal methods to play the game.
If you are a company, please contact the author on Twitter (@suwe_T) or by e-mail.

Safe design that tells you the timing of ejaculation (girl's climax) in 5 counts!


The next objective is displayed in text in the upper left corner of the screen so you don't get lost!

A heart mark is displayed on the character who has an H-scene, so you can easily recognize it!
If the target character is in a room, it will also be displayed on the door of the building.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340相当以上(2013年 第四世代)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGLに対応したもの VRAM 1 GB以上
  • Storage: 429 MB available space

reviews:
“A game in which the main character is ordered by the goddess to defeat the demon king as a way to make the store prosper, and goes on an adventure while having sex. The story is fairly light, so it can be enjoyed casually. The party is full of unique personalities, including a cheerful hero, a brave and pretentious hero, a strong but weak-minded dragon tribe, and a goddess who is mired in the world. The voices are gorgeous. I was entertained by the parodies in some places, although I wondered if they were okay.”
5.0 – ミミミョーリュ
